description:
Are you a Makeup Artist or Upcoming or you want to learn new skills, ideas and latest trends? Join the group to learn, collaborate and share your makeup with millions of members now !

IF YOU HAVE BEEN POSTING AND IT HAS NEVER BEEN APPROVED IT'S DUE TO  THE FOLLOWING REASONS 👇

1: Posts with links or phone number are not allowed in here UNLESS is  been #PAID  for.

2: Post shared to the group from another group / page are highly unacceptable. It will never be approved.

3: If you want to place an advert here
Kindly message Sam Ade for details.

How does the process work:
We provide a one-stop service to Makeup Artists, upcoming and members can simply posts photos with details, tutorials, videos, tips, ideas, questions, requests, latest trends and skills etc.

Welcome to the group.

We are all from different countries and we have different styles, let's learn to tolerate each other and respect each other's.

1 - First of all and very important !!!
If you post crypto links or scam or spam links, you'll immediately be blocked.

We have a great community and a fantastic admin team to keep this a clean and professional place to discuss makeup free from spam and scams. Please report any suspicious activity.

2 - Also very important in this group !!!
People are free to post what they want as long as it's makeup related if you don't like a post just ignore it, do not engage and upset people or you will be blocked, please help us keep this a safe group for our members and report any spam or scams.

3 - Do not bully people in this group or you will be blocked, if you don't like a post just ignore it. AUTOMATIC REMOVAL FROM OUR GROUP FOR BULLYING.

Please don’t private message anyone on this group without asking them first on an open comment.
Any reports of anyone doing this you will be removed and banned.


Makeup Artists is created and admin by Sam Ade

Enjoy the group and keep safe.
